title: Is there still problems with league of legends and TPG or potential problems?
body: Hi, looking at switching over to TPG and I know league has a bad history with TPG so will it be Okay?

replies.body: Yeh they kinda have a bad history together. I used to and sometimes on certain occasions still do have a problem where it says it can't connect t o the http server. I fixed by changing the dns but sometimes I still have the problem
